${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you change the constructor of your card to use super(cardInfo, true); this will be the card's description when it is upgraded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Conditioning.NAME: Conditioning
${modID}:Conditioning.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Feedback and temporary Strength to ANY target. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Conditioning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Feedback and temporary Strength to ANY target. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HierarchyOfNeeds.NAME: Hierarchy of Needs
${modID}:HierarchyOfNeeds.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you already have Block, gain !M! Temporary_HP instead. If you already have Block and Temporary_HP, heal !M! HP instead.

${modID}:Medication.NAME: Medication
${modID}:Medication.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase this card's cost by !M! this combat.

${modID}:NegativeReinforcement.NAME: Negative Reinforcement
${modID}:NegativeReinforcement.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Feedback to ALL enemies.

${modID}:NewLeaf.NAME: New Leaf
${modID}:NewLeaf.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. Gain Vigor equal to their total cost.

${modID}:Perfectionism.NAME: Perfectionism
${modID}:Perfectionism.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you're missing HP, gain !M! ${modID}:Feedback.

${modID}:Pseudoscience.NAME: Pseudoscience
${modID}:Pseudoscience.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Rigor. Lose 3 ${modID}:Rigor at the start of each turn.

${modID}:RetailTherapy.NAME: Retail Therapy
${modID}:RetailTherapy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Whenever spend gold at a shop, increase the damage of this card by 1.

${modID}:SelfCare.NAME: Self Care
${modID}:SelfCare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. If you have Block, draw a card.
